0:
player_limit: -1
ip_forward: true
permissions:
  default:
  - bungeecord.command.server
  - bungeecord.command.list
  - alert.trigger
  - slashserver.lobby
  - slashserver.survival
  - slashserver.survival2
  admin:
  - bungeecord.command.alert
  - bungeecord.command.end
  - bungeecord.command.ip
  - bungeecord.command.reload
  - alert.receive
  - alert.receive.firstjoin
  - alert.command.toggle
  - alert.command.reload
  family:
  - bungeecord.server.survival
timeout: 30000
log_pings: true
log_commands: false
online_mode: true
servers:
  lobby:
    motd: '&1eviljungle lobby'
    address: mc-lobby-minecraft:25565
    restricted: false
  creative:
    motd: 'creative server'
    address: mc-minecraft:25565
    restricted: false
  survival:
    motd: 'Survival SMP'
    address: mcsv-minecraft:25565
    restricted: false
  survival2:
    motd: 'Public Survival EZ-mode SMP'
    address: mcsv2-minecraft:25565
    restricted: false
listeners:
- query_port: 25577
  motd: '&3eviljungle &6&Llobby'
  priorities:
  - lobby
  bind_local_address: true
  tab_list: GLOBAL_PING
  query_enabled: true
  host: 0.0.0.0:25577
ping_passthrough: true
groups:
  billimek:
  - admin
  - family
  AnsleyElla:
  - family
  BrinleyHarper:
  - family

curl -s -d "The local restic check failed" -H "Title: Backups" -H "Tags: rotating_light" "http://ntfy.comms.svc.cluster.local/homelab"
curl -fsS -m 10 --retry 5 -o /dev/null "http://healthchecks.monitoring.svc.cluster.local/ping/${HEALTHCHECKS_RESTIC_LOCAL_CHECK_UUID}/fail"

curl -s -d "The remote restic check failed" -H "Title: Backups" -H "Tags: rotating_light" "http://ntfy.comms.svc.cluster.local/homelab"
curl -fsS -m 10 --retry 5 -o /dev/null "http://healthchecks.monitoring.svc.cluster.local/ping/${HEALTHCHECKS_RESTIC_REMOTE_CHECK_UUID}/fail"

- job_name: node-exporter
  scrape_interval: 1m
  scrape_timeout: 10s
  honor_timestamps: true
  static_configs:
    - targets:
        - "opnsense.${PRIVATE_DOMAIN}:9100"

until [ -f /snapshots/kopia.repository.f ]; do
    printf "\e[1;32m%-6s\e[m\n" "Waiting for the Kopia repo to become ready ..."
    sleep 1
done
Welcome to Bryan's Ark Server - Map: Extinction

[/Script/ShooterGame.ShooterGameUserSettings]
Version=5
AlwaysAllowStructurePickUp=True
[ServerSettings]
AllowFlyerCarryPvE=True
AllowThirdPersonPlayer=True
XPMultiplier={{ .server.xpMultiplier }}
allowThirdPersonPlayer=1
AllowCaveBuildingPvE=1
alwaysNotifyPlayerJoined=1
alwaysNotifyPlayerLeft=1
bAllowFlyerCarryPvE=1
bDisableStructureDecayPvE=1
DinoCharacterHealthRecoveryMultiplier=2.00000
DinoCharacterStaminaDrainMultiplier=0.50000
DinoCharacterFoodDrainMultiplier=0.25
HarvestAmountMultiplier=1.50000
TamingSpeedMultiplier=8.00000
DifficultyOffset=1.00000
OverrideOfficialDifficulty=5.00000
AllowAnyoneBabyImprintCuddle=1
[AutoTrough]
NoInventory=True
[StructuresPlus]
EnableEngramOverride=true
AdditionalSupportDistanceInFoundations=10
BunkBedCooldownTimeInSeconds=60
AllowDynamicPillarNonFoundationSupport=True
AllowDynamicPillarSupport=True
[ArkAutomatedSettings]
KitchenModActive=True
[AwesomeSpyGlass]
AllowStructureTargeting=False
AllowOutline=False
